description:
After winning against Kazuma in their duel, Mutsumi tells Kae how he feels about her. Igarashi, Nanashima, Shinomiya and Nishina are shocked by this sudden move on Mutsumi`s part, and take action to prevent him from making any more advances on Kae. However, in the end, they decide to all get together and tell Kae how they honestly feel about her along with Mutsumi. Kae decides to go on a date with all of them individually to decide who`s feelings she will accept.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Que voulez-vous que je fasse de cette popularité ?
私がモテてどうすんだ
